name: Boozeo
shortDescription: Step into Boozeo — a vibrant 3D social bar metaverse! Customize your avatar, join or host parties, play branded mini-games like slots and spin wheel, and connect with others in a lively virtual nightlife experience.
fullDescription:
Boozeo is a lively 3D social bar simulator and metaverse where players can relax, play, and socialize in a virtual nightlife world. Create your avatar, explore interactive environments, play exciting mini-games, and connect with others through parties, chat, and dance moves.

🌟 Key Features:

  • 🎭 Avatar Customization & Profile: Design your unique avatar, view personal stats, and track daily login rewards.
  • 🎉 Social & Party System: Host private gatherings or join open parties. Meet new people, chat, and track visitors and trending hangouts.
  • 🏙️ Immersive 3D Bar Environment: Enjoy a detailed virtual bar with interactive elements like a pool table, hookah, and media screen — all in real-time multiplayer.
  • 🎰 Mini-Games & Rewards: Try your luck on the Boozeo Slot Machine featuring real-world liquor brands like Captain Morgan, Jim Beam, and Staropramen. Spin the Daily Wheel for a chance to win gold coins and exclusive prizes.
  • 💃 Animations & Emotes: Express yourself with a wide variety of dance moves, gestures, and emotes to keep the party alive.
  • 💰 In-Game Currency: Earn, track, and spend your gold coins as you participate in various activities and rewards throughout the bar.

🎬 Trailer: Watch on YouTube

📸 Highlights: Immersive bar and club environments, social and party interactions, slot machine and spin wheel gameplay, avatar customization, and expressive animations.
